TroughRecolor.AllowValues: Auto, Vanilla, Earthy, Elegant, Rustic, Vibrant Pastoral
TroughRecolor.Description: Controls the interior recolor of the Terrarium feeding trough. There is automatic compatibility with Earthy Recolor, More Elegant Town Interiors, Rustic Country Town Interiors, and Vibrant Pastoral Recolor, but you can also select a recolor manually.
